evidence.text: ALLISON: Bed rest is great. I can't go anywhere. Or do anything. But really, I'm fine. I can't wait to be a Mom, but I miss my kids. If all goes well, I'll be back at school full-time next fall.

JUSTIN: I'll be honest, Allison and I weren't sure about whether to have this party. But together there's nothing we can't overcome. You're the strongest woman I know and I love you more than anything. And I am so damn excited to keep building our life together.

ALLISON: It's all gonna be fine, babe.
ALLISON: We're gonna have a family.
